downloadTitle: Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide provides procedure and reference information for system implementers, IT managers, system administrators, and others who are responsible for planning, implementing, and maintaining Office in their organizations.
detailsSection:
The Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide provides procedure and reference information for system implementers, IT managers, system administrators, and others who are responsible for planning, implementing, and maintaining Office in their organizations. This document provides guidance for using Office for Mac 2011 with Microsoft Exchange Server, Windows SharePoint Services, Rights Management server, and related products.

Note:   You can also view the Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide online.

The Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide covers the following:
  • Overview and Evaluation
    Office for Mac 2011 Administrator's Guide overview
    How Office for Mac 2011 delivers business value
    Compare Office 2008 for Mac with Office for Mac 2011
    Office for Mac 2011 system requirements
    Online training for information workers
    About Microsoft Volume Licensing programs

  • Planning for Outlook for Mac 2011
    Default ports for Outlook for Mac 2011
    Outlook for Mac 2011 features supported by different versions of Exchange Server
    Compare Outlook for Mac 2011 with Outlook 2010 for Windows
    How information is synchronized between Outlook for Mac 2011 and Exchange Server
    How the Autodiscover service works with Outlook for Mac 2011
    Using Outlook for Mac 2011 with ISA Server and AD LDS
    Digital certificate requirements for sending and receiving messages
    How users manage digital certificates in Outlook for Mac 2011
    Using Outlook for Mac with Kerberos authentication

  • Planning to Use Office for Mac 2011 with SharePoint
    Office for Mac 2011 and SharePoint integration features
    Working with SharePoint sites

  • Deploying Office for Mac 2011
    Deployment options for Office for Mac 2011
    Deploy Office for Mac 2011
    Customize and deploy Office for Mac Standard 2011
    Deploy Office for Mac 2011 updates
    Remove Office for Mac 2011
    Deploy Office for Mac 2011 preferences
    Post-Installation: Configuring Exchange accounts in Outlook for Mac 2011

  • Maintaining Office for Mac 2011
    Turn logging on or off in Outlook for Mac 2011
    Backing up the Outlook for Mac 2011 database
    Managing Mac OS X system preferences

  • Security in Office for Mac 2011
    Understanding security threats
    Best practices for a security-enhanced environment
    Information Rights Management in Office for Mac 2011
    Configure privacy options in Office for Mac 2011
    Configure document protection settings in Office for Mac 2011
    Configure security settings for macros in Excel for Mac 2011
    Deploy Office 2010 for Mac security preferences
    Mac OS X passwords
    Mac OS X firewall

  • Troubleshooting Office for Mac 2011
    I can't download the volume license version of Office for Mac 2011 by using Safari
systemRequirementsSection: Note: To view the Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide .pdf in Windows, you will need the free software program, Adobe Reader. or you can view an online version here.
installInstructionSection:
Note:   You can also view the Microsoft Office for Mac 2011 Administrator Guide online.

To install this download on Mac OS X:
  1. Print this page if you want to use it as a reference when you are offline.
  2. Click the download.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to save the file to your hard disk. If you are using Safari, the downloaded file is saved to the desktop unless you specified a different location in the Preferences dialog box of Safari. To check your preferences, on the Safari menu, click Preferences, and then click General).
  4. On your hard disk, double-click the file that you downloaded.

To install this download on Windows:
  1. Print this page if you want to use it as a reference when you are offline.
  2. Click the download.
  3. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
  4. On your hard disk, double-click the file that you downloaded.
